description: Request for Proposal for facilities maintenance and support services to the Department of National Defence (DND) at CFS St. John's and outlying areas, NL.
full_summary:
**Call for Proposals: Facilities Maintenance and Support Services for CFS St. John’s (NL)**

**Title:** Facilities Maintenance and Support Services, CFS St. John’s (NL)

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01012377

**Tender Information:**

* **Publication Date**: November 3, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: December 12, 2022, at 14:00:00 (NST)
* **Tender Status**: Closed (Expired)

**Overview:**

Construction de Defence Canada invites proposals from qualified contractors to provide facilities maintenance and support services to the Department of National Defence (DND) for installations located in CFS St. John’s and Outlying Areas, NL.

**Services:**

The selected contractor will be required to provide maintenance and support services for all identified buildings and their associated infrastructure within the defined property limits. This includes maintenance and upkeep to prevent normal wear and tear throughout the Contract term.

**Period of Service:**

The initial Period of Service will be for three (3) years. If mutually agreeable between the contractor and Construction de Defence Canada, the Period of Service may be extended for up to two (2) additional two (2) year periods, for a possible total Period of Service of seven (7) years.

**Estimated Contract Value:**

The estimated contract value of this project is in the order of $7,273,000.00, including optional periods, Prime Cost Allowances, and one-time mobilization payment.

**Security Requirements:**

The selected contractor must comply with the security requirements identified in the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents.

**Next Steps:**

Two non-mandatory site visits have been scheduled for November 15-16, 2022. Interested contractors should review the RFP documents for details.

**Proposal Submission:**

Proposals must be submitted through the MERX Electronic Bidding System no later than the tender closing date and time.

**Contact Information:**

For more information or to obtain the RFP documents, please contact Mark Smith at mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca or 613-859-0549. Please refer to the DCC website for contract award results. [Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada]( https://www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca/contract-activity/)
